resources.string:
policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across on app , and other sites we own and operate.


We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent.


We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law.


Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.
You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services. Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.


This policy is effective as of 09 august2021.

Terms of Use for APNA MZP Customers 

 Important – please read these terms carefully. By using the Service (as defined below), you agree that you have read, understood, accepted and agreed with the Terms of Use (as defined below). You further agree to the representations made by yourself below. If you do not agree to or fall within the Terms of Use of the Service and wish to discontinue using the Service, please do not continue using the Application (as defined below) or the Service.

 The Terms of Use stated herein (collectively, the “Terms of Use” or this “Agreement”) constitute a legal agreement between YOU and APNA MZP PARTNERSHIP (GSTIN No. 09ABWFA9765B1ZU) (the “Company”). In order to use the Service you must agree to the Terms of Use that are set out below. By using the mobile application, you hereby expressly acknowledge and agree to be bound by the Terms of Use, and any future amendments and additions to the Terms of Use as published from time to time at terms and conditions or through the Application.

 For the purpose of these Terms of Use, wherever the context so requires “You” or “User” shall mean any natural or legal person who has agreed to because a user on the Application by providing registration data while registering on the Application. The term “We”, “Us”, “Our” shall mean the Company.

 The Company reserves the right to modify, vary and change the Terms of Use or its policies relating to the Service at any time as it deems fit. You agree that it shall be your responsibility to review the Terms of Use regularly.

 THE COMPANY IS A TECHNOLOGY COMPANY. THE COMPANY IS NOT A FOOD OR BEVERAGE VENDOR. THE SERVICE OF THE COMPANY IS TO LINK INDEPENDENT THIRD-PARTY FOOD DELIVERY SERVICE PROVIDERS (“DELIVERY SERVICE PROVIDER”) WITH APPLICATION USERS AND FOOD AND BEVERAGE SERVICE PROVIDERS AVAILABLE ON OUR APPLICATION (“VENDOR”).

 IT IS UP TO EACH DELIVERY SERVICE PROVIDER TO OFFER AND PROVIDE FOOD DELIVERY SERVICES TO YOU. THE MERCHANTS ALSO OPERATE INDEPENDENTLY OF THE COMPANY. THE SERVICE OF THE COMPANY DOES NOT NOR IS IT INTENDED TO PROVIDE FOOD AND BEVERAGE AND/OR DELIVERY SERVICES. THERE WILL BE NO ACT OF THE COMPANY THAT CAN BE CONSTRUED IN ANY WAY AS AN ACT OF A VENDOR OR DELIVERY SERVICE PROVIDER. THE COMPANY WILL NOT ASSESS THE SUITABILITY, LEGALITY OR ABILITY OF ANY DELIVERY SERVICE PROVIDER OR VENDOR. THE COMPANY IS NOT RESPONSIBLE OR LIABLE FOR THE VENDOR’S FOOD PREPARATION, FOOD HYGIENE AND SAFETY AND THE COMPANY DOES NOT VERIFY ANY VENDOR’S COMPLIANCE WITH APPLICABLE LAWS OR FOOD HYGIENE AND SAFETY REGULATIONS.

SORRY… we generally DO NOT entertain any Order Cancellations – because once the order is placed on the Restaurant – the Restaurants generally DO NOT entertain cancellation of orders. However, in case you request us for an Order Cancellation prior to the order being placed on the Restaurant – then the cancellation of the order is up to the discretion of APNA MZP™. In case of Delivery of Order being LATE or BAD or INCORRECT… APNA MZP™ adheres to a very high standard of Quality of Services – and is very STRICT in terms of achieving a very high level of Customer Satisfaction. Hence, in case of an Order being LATE or BAD or INCORRECT – wing to a process related issue of APNA MZP™ – we generally DO NOT charge the customer for the order… but, this is totally up to the discretion of APNA MZP™.

Customer satisfaction is our motto and we wish to reflect that in all the aspects of our business, including the Return, Refund and Cancellation Policy.


Cancellation · As a general rule you shall not be entitled to cancel your order once you have received confirmation of the same. If you cancel your order after it has been confirmed, ApnaMzp shall have a right to charge you cancellation fee of a minimum INR 50 up-to the order value, with a right to either not to refund the order value or recover from your subsequent order, the complete/ deficit cancellation fee, as applicable, to compensate our restaurant and delivery partners.


· A full refund will be issued if the concerned restaurant or food outlet or the admin cancels the order or unavailability of all the items ordered by you at the time of booking the order. We reserve the sole right to cancel your order

Support mobile:-9565810009 or 9565820009
email id:-apnamzp63@gmail.com
operating address:Pandeypur,mirzapur-231001

APNA MZP is an online ordering and delivery service offered by "APNA MZP PARTNERSHIP" with services initiated at UTTER PRADESH India. APNA MZP has partnered with popular vendors in the following categories Food, so you can order all your home needs from the comfort of your home. 


APNA MZP app allows you to choose vendors, browse their menu and select your choice of food / home needs, place order with an option of online payment or cash on delivery. Your favourite item gets delivered at your doorstep. 


Our goal at APNA MZP is to make it easier for customers to enjoy their meal at their own comfort and in the process enable businesses to serve their customers better. APNA MZP is available on Google Play (for Android).
